skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill, you can now interact with your A/V devices such as Switch, Air Conditioner through Smart Remote by voice.

Prerequisites:
 1. You need to get a Smart Remote device.
 2. Download Smart Remote app from for Android/iOs. Login and add Switch, Air Conditioner device in the app. Notice that your device name will be used in your voice command.
 3. Make sure you can now control your Switch, Air Conditioner through the app before go to next step.
 4. When you enable this skill, you will ask for account linking, use the account of Smart Remote app from step 2. Click Device Discover after account linking.
 5. Your Smart Remote devices (Switch, Air Conditioner) should be displayed in the Alexa app. You can now control your Switch, Air Conditioner by voice

Voice command list: (you must replace [name] with your device name)
1. For Switch device:
- Alexa, turn on [name]
2. For Air Conditioner device:
- Alexa, turn on [name]
- Alexa, set mode of [name] to auto
- Alexa, set [name] temperature to 20
- Alexa, set speed of [name] to auto
- Alexa, what is the temperature of [name]
- Alexa, what is the mode of [name]
- Alexa, what is the speed of [name]
